definition: abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on

sentences.english: All other metals and nonmetals lie within the boundaries of lead and diamond.
sentences.chinese: 所有其他金属和非金属都处在铅和金刚石的界限之内。

sentences.english: Porous ceramics is a kind of inorganic non-metal material that mostly includes pores.
sentences.chinese: 多孔陶瓷是一类以气孔为主相的无机非金属材料。

sentences.english: Non-metallic mineral resources are very rich in Inner Mongolia, but development and utilization are very poor.
sentences.chinese: 我区非金属矿产资源丰富，但开发利用程度很低。

sentences.english: Nonmetals are generally gases or soft solids that do not conduct electricity.
sentences.chinese: 非金属一般为气体或不导电的软固体。

sentences.english: This article deals with one of the subjects of technical economic polices about non-metallic mining industry.
sentences.chinese: 本文为非金属矿工业技术经济政策研究系列课题之一。

sentences.english: Even nonmetallic materials are dangerous to touch at these low temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 在这种低温下，甚至接触非金属材料也是危险的。

sentences.english: This method is extensively applicable to packaging non-metal, metal valuable products and exhibits.
sentences.chinese: 广泛适用于非金属，金属珍贵制品及陈列品的包装。

sentences.english: All metals are fairly hard, compared with nonmetals.
sentences.chinese: 与非金属相比，金属是相当硬的。

sentences.english: Applicable to the collection delivery of all kinds of rolls, either fine sheet metal nonmetallic material.
sentences.chinese: 适用于各种卷料之收放，薄板金属及非金属材料均可。

sentences.english: The machine could peer beneath passengers' clothes to search for hidden bombs and non-metal weapons.
sentences.chinese: 这个机器可以透过乘客衣服寻找炸弹和非金属武器。

sentences.english: Nonmetal nanoclusters are generated by inert-gas condensation.
sentences.chinese: 采用惰性气体凝聚法获得非金属团簇淀积体。

sentences.english: Using high pressure water jet cutting various metal, can with non-metallic material.
sentences.chinese: 利用高压水射流，可以切割各种金属与非金属材料。

sentences.english: A section of non-metallic tubing used to deliver compressed air for paint or powder application.
sentences.chinese: 为油漆或粉末涂装释放压缩空气的非金属管部分。

sentences.english: What is it that makes metals different from non-metals?
sentences.chinese: 是什么因素使金属与非金属互不相同？

sentences.english: The invention relates to a method for removing non-metallic inclusion in molten steel.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种钢液中非金属夹杂去除方法。

definition: alkaline earth (i.e. beryllium Be 鈹|铍, magnesium Mg 鎂|镁, calcium Ca 鈣|钙, strontium Sr 鍶|锶, barium Ba 鋇|钡 and radium Ra 鐳|镭)
simple substance (consisting purely of one element, such as diamond)
